title: Client problem in the game !!!!!
body: Guys l have a problem with client !! until l pick champs l dont have any problem but when the champs loading something is happening and l cant move my camera down and on the top of the screen its saying Lol Client TM ! if l want to leave the game or something l dont need to press alt+shift +esc just the x buton in the top right corner of y screen !! if you recognise what problem l have pls communicate with me as fast as you can !thank you all !

replies.body:
It sounds like you're running in **windowed mode**. You can switch to **Full Screen** by hopping into the **VIDEO** settings and under **Windowed Mode** select **Full Screen**. Below is a screenshot of what this looks like.

(Click to Enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/T8BYk

Let me know if this helps.
